bs-boilerplate-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of boilerplate extension

bs-boilerplate-pref-modus-no: Option in [[Special:Wiki_Admin&mode=Preferences]], radio button label for for boolean value 'no'
bs-boilerplate-somekey: Some screen text that has to be described here
